title: It Suits You More Than You Think It Does
detail_text: <:th_ch0007/>Umi-chan, how about this one-piece dress?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>Eh, this one? Isn’t it a little too short....?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>Is that so, I thought it looked cute, though.... Ah, then how about this one?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>N-, no way! It’s embarrassing enough to wear a miniskirt like this in lives, let alone as casual clothing....!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>Umi-chan, think about it the other way around. If you can wear this in lives, then it should be fine if you wear it casually. Besides, this one really fits you, Umi-chan.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>I-, I understand, I’ll try it on for now.... Then, since we’re here, how about you wear this outfit too, Nozomi? I think it suits you.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>Eh, this pink blouse? It’s cute, but I wonder if I could pull off the look.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>If you can wear it as a live outfit, wearing it as casual clothes shouldn’t be a problem, Nozomi.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>Well, you’re right. I won’t know until I try it on, right!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>Then it’s decided. Let’s try them on and show each other outside of the fitting room!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
